definition: first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: The modern Indic language of West Bengal and Bangladesh.
sentences.chinese: 印度東部位於孟加拉灣的一個邦。

sentences.english: Arakan stretched for some 350 miles along the eastern shore of the Bay of Bengal.
sentences.chinese: 阿拉幹沿着孟加拉灣東岸延伸約350英里。

sentences.english: Or go surfing in Port Blair in the Bay of Bengal.
sentences.chinese: 或者去位於孟加拉灣中部的布萊爾港衝浪。

sentences.english: For Delhi, the link is already there with Yamuna connection to Bay of Bengal.
sentences.chinese: 對於德里，亞穆納和孟加拉灣的連接線已經有了。

sentences.english: A country of southeast Asia on the Bay of Bengal and the Andaman Sea.
sentences.chinese: 一東南亞國家，位於孟加拉灣和安達曼海岸邊。
